thread.title: Docutech Unveils New Brand as Company Expands to New Markets
thread.title_full: Docutech Unveils New Brand as Company Expands to New Markets

author: admin
title: Docutech Unveils New Brand as Company Expands to New Markets
text:
Submitted by admin on 10/16/2015 @ 10:25 AM   DocuTech Corp. 
IDAHO FALLS, Idaho -- (BUSINESS WIRE) -- Docutech Corp., a leading provider of document generation and delivery technology , unveiled a new website and logo this week in conjunction with the company’s expansion of its innovative software to additional markets. Docutech’s new strategic direction addresses the needs of all financial institutions to provide a smooth user experience and improve the process for generating and delivering documents for any type of loan. 
Docutech’s innovative solutions enable financial institutions to improve the loan experience with dynamically generated customized packages that reduce operational costs while improving productivity and ensuring accuracy. Docutech also supports digital signatures, enabling clients to meet consumer demand for the completion of transactions electronically. 
“For nearly 25 years, Docutech has been on the front lines of helping lenders quickly and efficiently generate accurate documents,” said Ty Jenkins, founder and CEO of Docutech. “As a result, more than half of the top 10 firms listed in Mortgage Executive’s ‘Best Companies to Work For’ list rely on Docutech to deliver the documents that enable their customers to fulfill their dreams of homeownership. It only made sense to take the lessons we’ve learned in the mortgage industry and apply them to a broader financial landscape to help financial institutions better serve their customers.” 
As part of the rebranding process, Docutech also debuted a new professional, innovative look and feel to its website, logo and overall brand positioning, highlighted by the company’s new URL at www.docutech.com . 
Current customers, however, will experience no change in their products. Docutech’s exceptional service and dedication to maintaining a quality reputation will remain unchanged. 
“Great technology is nothing without an outstanding support team behind it,” said Chip Brown, Docutech’s Chief Operations Officer. “At Docutech, we’ve always made support a highest priority, with more than 90% of calls resolved on the first contact. Our team is here to help our clients provide the most seamless experience possible for the moments their borrowers value most.” 
About Docutech 
Founded in 1991, Idaho Falls, Idaho-based Docutech offers a wide-range of solutions to institutions all over the world. From document generation and imaging support, to eDelivery, digital signatures and print fulfillment, Docutech sets the standard in providing market-proven technology and unrivaled customer service to you, your workforce and your clients. For more information visit the company's website at www.docutech.com or follow them on social media at LinkedIn or Twitter @Docutech .
